website_summaries.verdict: A basic set that can be easily customized to the individual's photography needs.
pros: A basic package for beginners that includes the essentials
cons: (However, this bulb produces a bright 85 watts.)

customer_reviews.title: Great Light.. Poor quality stands and softboxes
customer_reviews.text: The lights are amazingly bright.. So In love with that.. Works great!! The stands are cheap some parts made of plastic and a piece was even broken when i recieved it.. the softboxes are a pain the butt.. with poles to stick into the boxes and the light its really goofy was hoping for a foldable pop up version.. I rated a 3 because the lights are really amazing and if your planning on just putting up in your house and leaving it along its great.. if you plan to travel with it.. yah your going to get some frustration.. because its going to start to break down after awhile the stands ect..
customer_reviews.author: dani

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC CUSTOMER SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these lights back in 2015. I'd give them a 5, but they're a little light weight. (not always a bad thing) The important thing is this company stands by its product. I was having trouble keeping the softbox at the right angle. It insisted on drooping. I contacted the company and within days they contacted me, and I had replacement parts that helped fix the problem. I love any company that reacts and responds this way. If you're considering these vs another similar product, DEFINITELY choose these.
customer_reviews.author: Argo

customer_reviews.title: Updated: Hardware is a large concern
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: June 2015 - The manufacturer took care of me on this and gave me a replacement hardware kit that solved all the problems. They said they were aware of the issue and I assume this means it comes with the correct hardware now. ---------------- The lights and the materials themselves are fine. My problem with the entire kit is the hardware. After only 2 months of using 4-5 times total, the heads of the lights constantly fall down and drop despite tightening the hardware. The reason why is the plastic clasp can't sustain the head of the weight and loses its grip. Very infuriating unfortunately. Other than that, the setup is fairly simple (took 30 minutes in total).
customer_reviews.author: C Di Giovanni

customer_reviews.title: I wish I didn't
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed when I finally tried to use this studio lights.. they weren't bright and even at 400 ISO, with a great lens and camera, (5d mk IV and 70-200mm 2.8) I could barely see the subject.. I brought the main lights literally very close to the subject and was just really disappointed at the results I go. Total darkness at 200 iso. I had to crank it up. And finally I just had to use multiple speed lights.. very sad that it's already one last day before I can return.. I don't have the power to pack this up tonight and return tomorrow
customer_reviews.author: Victor Oniagba

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: The hair arrived broken and one of the smaller lights did not work. Upon contacting the seller they promptly and quickly mailed me the missing bulbs separately. Quick response to my questions and even a follow up from them. Amazon connected me to the seller and the seller did the rest. I'm really impressed. So far I'm happy with the product, but I'm more happy with the customer service. Well done! 5-star service!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: This lighting system works great for my small apartment
customer_reviews.text: This lighting system works great for my small apartment. I recently recorded a YouTube video with these lights and received a lot of compliments on how professional my video looks. Some of my friends thought I paid someone to do the video for me but I didn't. I recorded and edited the video myself. I would suggest these lights to anyone who is a beginner at taking pictures or recording videos.
customer_reviews.author: Loyal Prime Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Used in a small space as well as in a bigger space. Works excellent in both! Awesome lighting! I tend to keep them in one area but they weren't too bad to transport down a few flights of stairs. Highly recommend! (used for youtube videos and a few pictures) They also do not get very hot which is nice. After a couple uses, one of the lightbulbs went out and they sent me a new one right away. Highly recommend buying from these guys. Very pleased with product and customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Approve
customer_reviews.text: Originally purchased CRAPHY Professional Photo Studio Soft Box Lights Continuous Lighting Kit 3x135W 5000K Bulbs + 20"x25" Softbox + 80" Light Stand + Carrying Bag and that was a mistake. Returned that kit and purchased this one. HUGE difference. The boom light stand and arm were made so much better. Bigger and stronger. I didn't even have to use the counter weight for the light when I first put it together. The light fixtures and availability to turn each bulb off on the 2 main diffused lights is great. Would recommend this kit to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Dorkmeister

customer_reviews.title: Works well, and goes together quickly. I take ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well, and goes together quickly. I take off one star because one of the lights blew out after being on for 10 seconds... they're obviously cheap lights and will likely need to be replaced. The kit does NOT come with any sandbags for the hair light, just the case to hold them, so make sure you buy your own! EDIT: Adding a star back on because the seller reached out to me to replace the bulb at no charge. Super-helpful customer service, even when I didn't look for it!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Most equipment came in a non-functional state.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived and was stable upon assembly. The instructions for assembly were veuge. All the lightbulbs were broken and one of the soft box sets was broken. Very dissatisfied and disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa L.

customer_reviews.title: FYI
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoy using these lights! Just like any other set up and tear down, it will take some tedious time. I keep my set up at all times unless I need to move things around in the room. After my 1st tear down, I did notice the base where you insert the light was broken, but after I contacted the company, they reshipped me a replacement part and it arrived in 2 days. Free of charge. I honestly love the lights and will continue to use them.
customer_reviews.author: K. Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Broken pieces...
customer_reviews.text: The lights are standard and work really well. On the down side a couple of the bulbs came broken I'm yet to use the overhead light becuase it came pcompletely shattered. The stands for the lights themselves are just okay you have get it on just right. One of my stands won't even hold one of the lights sadly. Overall the lights themselves are great, but the accessories and shipping need work :(.
customer_reviews.author: Gravity

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great light heads but HORRIBLY flimsy stands. But, for the price I'm happy with them. I will use the light stands I currently have that are much better and switch them with these stands.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter Light Kit
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this light kit in November of 2016 for a small personal project I had. More than a year later, they still work great and I haven't had any major issues - other than a broken bulb or two which was my fault. If your a beginner, and not planning to use the lights excessively, then this is a great starter kit to hone your skills.
customer_reviews.author: LDNY

customer_reviews.title: Great for simple home use filming
customer_reviews.text: Once you figure out how to assemble its easy. However it is a bit cumbersome and flimsy. It gets the job done for inhouse personal use. Would not last in a professional setting. I'm glad I bought it and would buy again for my in home use.
customer_reviews.author: Horace'sWorld

customer_reviews.title: Great photography-studio equipment!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a set of photography-studio equipment, and found it looked excellent. One item was broken. I informed the company and they immediately sent me a replacement and a courteous email. Now the complete set of equipment has made my studio a winner!
customer_reviews.author: Design4Waves

customer_reviews.title: Great Lighting
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this about a year now and think it’s about time to give this product a review. I was holding out to see if the product would last and well it has!! I originally bought these for holiday portraits but I’ve found that they can be used for so much more. With having to work from home during the pandemic I’ve set these up to help light the home office for meetings and zoom chats. These lights have so many functions and I’m so glad I bought these.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up, super bright, awesome kit!!!!!! Excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I read some people having a hard time with set up and even tho instructions werent super easy to read I had everything set up in no time and I didnt struggle with anything. Customer service is on point and I really love this kit. Such a great price too! All bulbs worked, shipping packaging was excellent & the lights are really bright plus easy to adjust. Excited to put them to use!
customer_reviews.author: shaida

customer_reviews.title: Great Softboxes
customer_reviews.text: I love that you can control each of the lights on the back of the light bank. This really allows me absolute control over the lighting. The bulbs are bright enough and I don’t suggest trying to add higher wattage bulbs. The overhead light is are a bit flimsy but the sandbags that are included really help to hold them down. I would purchase a few more bags just to weigh everything down. Good buy overall
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Gary

customer_reviews.title: Good lights
customer_reviews.text: I lowkey wanted the sandbag to be brought full, but alas I had to fill it up myself. Building the lights is a lengthy time taking Ikea like build, but as it’s meant for a studio, it’s fine. Overall, I approve.
customer_reviews.author: Rohan Rao

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, especially for the price. Pretty easy to set up. Despite great packaging, the lamps were cracked when I received them (still worked but not ideal of course). The company in closed a piece of paper with contact info in case of any issues so I emailed them photos of the lamps and requested new ones and I had them within 2 days. I’m thrilled with the quality of these and would recommend to anyone looking for photography lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT - HIGH QUALITY PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: I was VERY happy to receive this excellent, sturdy, high quality lighting set. It was easy to set up, not unwieldy and did a FABULOUS job! Several of the photos I did for people on a volunteer basis for a non-profit were BLOWN AWAY at how great the pics turned out! and I am not a professional photographer, just a buff. this lighting made my work look good! :)
customer_reviews.author: ChKay

customer_reviews.title: Good seller and good lighting kits.
customer_reviews.text: This is my best online shopping experience. When I received the lights kit there is a small problem on socket and the costumer service Alvin is very nice. He shipped me a new light immediately and helped me a lot. The lights is easy to setup for me. The light is bright enough and soft. It is good for videography and photography. I will buy more photography equipments in this store.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Wang

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Versatile
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Very versatile with the turning on and off of each light separately..
customer_reviews.author: Theresa B.

customer_reviews.title: BROKEN Bulb SCRATCHES, Definitely NOT new
customer_reviews.text: This item is okay. However I paid $154 on it and it came with the head light bulb BROKEN and the unit had scratches on it with a few of the bulb boxes cut. It seems this item was already used and just resold for this price. IDK how to feel. I mean it works I have to go buy another lightbulb. And the only reason I'm not returning it is cause I need it now, and the hassle of repackaging it urks me.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha-Marie Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Online product photography
customer_reviews.text: This works for online product photography. We made a horizon less curved platform and this functioned well. The overhead light is massive and bright. Adds a nice lighting element and angle of lighting to the pictures. The only negative is that the lightbulbs don’t have individual cases which makes traveling with them difficult
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: Broken clamp but good customer service
customer_reviews.text: The boom stand arrived with a broken clamp but the manufacturer sent out a replacement part right away. Overall a decent package for the money although the clamps could be a little more heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: A+ Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The lamp head retaining screew that locks the position of the lamp head failed after just a few uses. I was able to lock the position of the head it just flops down. However, the seller fixed this issue by sending me secure and sturdy replacement parts. the Seller is A+ in customer service and now with the replacement parts the light kit is working very well!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Ok heads- crappy grips
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price- the friction grip/stops are plastic with plastic teeth and metal hardware. The metal tears at the plastic and the plastic grip teeth start to strip. So the units will start sliding and no longer hold up the heads pretty soon after you buy these. However, for the heads and amount of bulbs you get with them- its not bad- just replace with metal C-stands.
customer_reviews.author: Adam D

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product! Easy to assemble and disassemble
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product! Easy to assemble and disassemble, light enough to move around but not too light. Make sure you actually put some weight in the weight bags though, otherwise, your softbox will topple over depending on the angle you're using it at.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Perfection!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I wish I had found these months ago! I've spent way too much money trying to find lights to photograph clothing in my dim basement for my online business and these are the best. They were simple to assemble and truly make the colors pop!
customer_reviews.author: HJH777

customer_reviews.title: Cheap  light set that get the job done just not very  sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Boom light is to heavy for the pole and tripod, the teeth of the pole and tripod they just don't keep it in place I had to tight it with the cord. over all a cheap light set that get the job done just not very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Munoz

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: The 2 main softboxes are great and sturdy. Aoftboxes are nice and large. The overhead seems a little flimsy. The sandbag that is included does help but keep in mind that you need to fill with your own weights. I had to go to the local playground to fill for free. I like the results so far.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Ward

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised how good of a job these did and highly recommend as a first lighting setup. As you can see from the video we did some basic interviews using an 80MM lens and we think they look just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Very clean and bright white light awesome for taking pictures we also use them to light ...
customer_reviews.text: Very clean and bright white light awesome for taking pictures we also use them to light a room some times at night to see a bit better.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: These boxes can be very annoying and time-consuming to setup
customer_reviews.text: These boxes can be very annoying and time-consuming to setup. The light output is great, but I do not like their design.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Value Kit
customer_reviews.text: Quality is good enough for casual user and the price is right. Light fixtures are very nice and stand quality is better than the cheapest brands, but not pro quality for sure. Still, a good value for someone looking to add to their capabilities without breaking the bank.
customer_reviews.author: T. Griffin

customer_reviews.title: They are good, but not practical to store if you don't ...
customer_reviews.text: They are good, but not practical to store if you don't have the space to store them assembled. They are also difficult to assemble so you can't store them like that if you will use them frecuently.
customer_reviews.author: PEDRO ESPANA

customer_reviews.title: it works great.
customer_reviews.text: They work well for my needs. They are static in my studio. But, I have already lost a light bulb to one stand toppling over. Doesn't take much. I gently walk by and clipped the stand with a piece of molding and down it went. The base of the stands should expand further to create a bit more stability. As far as the lighting... it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Only a few hours in and I already LOVE them!
customer_reviews.text: Just got my lights in the mail today. It took a little while to set them up (mostly unpacking), but it was SO worth it. I've been using lamps for photograph clothing for my new Etsy shop, Foxtrail Vintage, and I didn't realize how bad the lighting was until I got these lights. I'm so excited and motivated to take more photos.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Items shipped on time and work well. One light showed up damaged, but Customer Service replaced it immediately with no questions asked. Not to mention, they followed up to make sure I received the replacement piece. Worth the price, happy customer here!
customer_reviews.author: Jenevieve Froncek

customer_reviews.title: Not as big as expected
customer_reviews.text: Lights are very bright white and diffused well. They are not as big as the picture makes them look and the stands are very flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Great for photos
customer_reviews.text: First let me say that I am a complete novice when it comes to photography, but I bought this to take Christmas photos of my kids. The pictures came out great and it wasn't incredibly hard to figure out how to set things up.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Morrissey

customer_reviews.title: A+ Product
customer_reviews.text: This product is fantastic! It was great to get good looking photos in a matter of minutes. They work well for a really low price point. Most of the knobs and connectors are made of plastic so if you take care of the stands they should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Good white brightness
customer_reviews.text: Good white brightness, light control on the two side stand lights. Boom for the over the top light is a bit flimsy and it's rotating mechanism is plastic and made of cheap material.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: good: The packaging is very good. The bags are very practical and spacious. Taking into account: The boom stand is a bit fragile, if you extend all must put a good counterbalance. At the begining I worked so hard to assemble the softbox, but I found it was much easier if you set the lamps support the tripod and there start to assemble the softbox
customer_reviews.author: Salvador A.

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer - great value!
customer_reviews.text: I'd read previous reviews about how the instructions for assembling this were lacking, but that wasn't my experience. The printed instructions were clear and it was easy to assemble. Took me about an hour to set up all three lights. I'm very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent
customer_reviews.text: Decent for the cost, but the bulbs can get damaged easily when packed up. And the boom arm suuuuucks.
customer_reviews.author: Atlas

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginner learning
customer_reviews.text: The lighting es perfecto for green screen lighting. 3 point lighting with key light . Daylight balanced and setup was under 30 minutes. Wish there were cases for the bulbs for storage but for the price it’s great!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gina Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. It's perfect for what I want to do with it. Makes a big difference. The only reason I gave it a 4/5 stars is because the bulb it came with was shipped broken. I tried a household bulb and it worked well so I know it was their bulb. Otherwise, great buy for the money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Blondie

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit
customer_reviews.text: This is all you really need for some basic photography. It’s one of the best light kits and does what it needs to do. The lights are great brightness and the stands are durable. Everything has held up well
customer_reviews.author: Marla

customer_reviews.title: check these lights out!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This set is exactly as I had hoped for!!! Remember you get what you pay for as the old saying goes well they have started a new saying with this one you get a little more than what you pay for!!! Please do remember this is what I would call a studio starter set. Do not think they are quality to take to outside location shots with you. But I wouldn't have a problem taking them to other indoor locations with me. The light control is spectacular every bulb has its own power switch. Thanks for the quality for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Allender

customer_reviews.title: ... mins to set it all up but they are great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Takes about 30 mins to set it all up but they are great quality for the price. Used mainly for dance studio pics.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Excellent lighting kit
customer_reviews.text: Excellent lighting kit. Takes a 30 minutes to setup the first time around just because I wasn't familiar. Once you know how, it's a breeze. I use this for small tutorial videos and the light make the video look professional
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy lane

customer_reviews.title: Flawless
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bang for the dollar. I can’t even tell you how many times how many times these lights have saved me . The lights are super bright and makes everything look great.
customer_reviews.author: Jes

customer_reviews.title: Great Bargin!
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good set for the price that you pay. I was very happy that it comes with bulbs so as soon as you receive it you can start using it! Also, it came securely packed and comes with a bag to put everything back in when you get done.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: These lights work well and are probably the best bang for your buck. I can't really complain about them. The lights are extra bright and do well to illuminate a small area. I use them in a 10ft area and they can be used as the primary light source. The setup does take a while to put up and take down but for me I keep them set up at all times. Overall a good buy. It is just as advertised and I would recommend them to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Product is great and the price is even better. One day after setting up, a bulb went out. I emailed the third party company that night, and they sent out a replacement the following morning.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Decent light output, arrived with broken bulbs, confusing assembly instructions
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with broken light bulbs (one non functional, another was shattered in the packaging). Somewhat confusing instructions, build quality is about what you'd expect at this price point, not great but should be usable if you don't move it
customer_reviews.author: w

customer_reviews.title: Great lights
customer_reviews.text: Excellent item and good light. Seller promptly replaced one bank and bulb that did not work right out from the box.
customer_reviews.author: VNV

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my purpose. I don’t have to take them up or down as I always take photos in my office.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the dollar
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the dollar. The only problem is the swivel on the heads for the two 5 light boxes. Seller sent better replacements at no charge. The originals would not support the heads with the soft boxes installed.
customer_reviews.author: SBS

customer_reviews.title: Perfecto!!
customer_reviews.text: The item came quickly undamaged and works like it's supposed to. Was a little difficult to set up but that's ok because I don't plan to take them down.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Item Was Damaged But Works
customer_reviews.text: Not very easy to set up but does provide adequate lighting. One of the light boxes was broken when I opened the box but it still works.
customer_reviews.author: John D.

customer_reviews.title: Still working
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these lights for a year now and they still work great. The bulbs are long lasting an I can't wait to use them over the holidays!
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Broken and Tedious
customer_reviews.text: Just opening the package, I keep finding more things wrong about the delivery. Defective light stand, broken velcro in the soft box, on top of it all the set up is laborious and painstaking.
customer_reviews.author: Emily E. Krause

customer_reviews.title: ... and flimsy but overall the lights put out a good amount of light
customer_reviews.text: The overhead light is a little bulky and flimsy but overall the lights put out a good amount of light. Had them set up in 20 minutes. Look forward to getting some more use out of them
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Great lighting on a budget
customer_reviews.text: Great lighting on a budget. The lights are much brighter than I had expected. Setup was simple enough. I've had much success with taking some very high quality pictures with great lighting. Awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Product Arrived Broken
customer_reviews.text: Bulbs arrived broken, could not test product. Had to return entire item, could not have issue resolved without returning entire order :-(
customer_reviews.author: victoria richards

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup and use
customer_reviews.text: The lighting kit exceeds my expectations. Easy to setup and use. Really enhanced my product photos. I reduced pos editing to half the time originally.
customer_reviews.author: michelle ito

customer_reviews.title: Well Done
customer_reviews.text: Nicely done. I love that I can alter the output by using the individual light switches on the back of the multi-bulb fixtures.
customer_reviews.author: Doc Brown

customer_reviews.title: Still Great!
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for a few months now using every so often for family and baby portraits. They still work great. Nothing has broken and hope to get alot of great pics during the holidays
customer_reviews.author: mary mills

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little starter lighting kit. I like that these lights put out a decent amount of light and the number of lightbulbs that come with the kit. The overhead boom is a little pain in the butt to figure out but just check out the product images and it should give you a good idea. Overall I am impressed with the kit especially at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They work great for my
customer_reviews.text: I'm a real estate agent and use these lights to light up rooms for listing pictures. They work great for my purpose
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: good deal, although the large bulb in the top light only lasted 4 hours!.
customer_reviews.author: zoey m.

customer_reviews.title: was easy to put together despite there being no instructions
customer_reviews.text: Came undamaged, was easy to put together despite there being no instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product indeed
customer_reviews.text: Great product indeed. Amazing lighting. You really do feel much more of a professional with these. Only issue was that the switch on the large light has a short and sometimes it sparks. Really odd.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan I.

customer_reviews.title: but the quality is good for my purposes (photobooth lighting) and the tripods are ...
customer_reviews.text: A bit of a challenge to put together, but the quality is good for my purposes (photobooth lighting) and the tripods are well made and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: JocelynD

customer_reviews.title: Hell yes!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together. Super good quality for the price. I'm happy
customer_reviews.author: Dominick Attilano

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lights work great indoors for family portraits. Easy to set up and happy with the quality
customer_reviews.author: Delores Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: These lights provide great light. That's the main thing. I use them at least once a week in a portable situation. I don't expect them to hold up very long. The stands are flimsy and a Velcro fastener has already torn off of an inside diffuser. The softboxes are not hard to put together. I found a simple tutorial video on YouTube.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Kelley

customer_reviews.title: perfect for starter photographers
customer_reviews.text: Great lights <3 I use these with every indoor shoot!! I love these!!!
customer_reviews.author: Angel Lee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great so far and does what it's supposed to. Easy to put together as well.
customer_reviews.author: Turk

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Yes, pain in the rear to build the first time. Yes, as soon as built and test....blew a fuse the second I light it up. And yes....no instructions on how to assemble the boom. So....you get what you pay for. Only thing that makes it worth it is the price and the fact that lights work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: The set up is pretty intuitive. The price is great and the lighting is outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: POW

customer_reviews.title: great for holiday pictures
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a few months ago and provided great lighting for my holiday pictures. While these are no way PRO quality they are great for the hobbyist and home photographers and videographers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall good
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup. Love that you can control each individual light. Overall a good decent lighting setup. Puts out bright daylight balanced lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it
customer_reviews.text: This is a great lighting kit. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: RedEyedJedi_77

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I needed a softbox lighting kit and this one is brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: Nic Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent for the $
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a good product for the price, to light up some product images for my website. The assembly directions aren't worth much, as mentioned elsewhere. Youtube has a few tutorials.
customer_reviews.author: Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product ! Very pleased and wonderful customer service too .
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Woods

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Not bad at all. Worked well. Although setup is a drag because there are no proper instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Osaze

customer_reviews.title: Great lighting
customer_reviews.text: Used these lights over the weekend for a video interview. The lights are bright enough to use on their own and put out a good color. I am delighted with the purchase and know I will get good use of this kit
customer_reviews.author: Josh armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this is a very good product and it was delivered fast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great lighting kit for a beginner.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great kit for the price. A little difficult to set up the first time but if you look at past reviews a previous buyer laid out simple instructions. If youre looking for a lighting setup you can't go wrong with this.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Griffin

customer_reviews.title: ... videos for about 4 months now and still works great.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for youtube videos for about 4 months now and still works great.
customer_reviews.author: Alberto Moreno

customer_reviews.title: it became easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Items arrived fast and as described. However, they didn't come with instructions on how to put the equipment together. With a little patience, it became easy to assemble. Pleased with my lighting equipment!
customer_reviews.author: Hollie Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and very strong lighting for the price
customer_reviews.author: Kelvin

customer_reviews.title: Lots of good lighting
customer_reviews.text: Great lighting. I like that it came with an extra heavy duty sandbag. I will definitely need to order more of those. Lots of light enough to light up a small area in a room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product for the price!!... Set up was pretty simple after I read the previous reviews.. The lighting is great, I used it several times for family photos for some friends.. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: DJUANVONDA W.
